availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Timothy Johnson (Owsley County, Kentucky, coal miner.)

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, coal miner. Estill County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarahan Pittman Johnson on April 11, 1854. Father of John Johnson and Liza A. Johnson. Coal miner in Owsley County in 1860. Corporal in the 54th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) from September 1, 1864 to September 1, 1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 69. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Owsley County Marriages, p. unknown. Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 541.
